name: Child's Play (Xychara)
description:
Gameplay

Click and drag the Knight, Mage, Royalty and Dragon characters into the sandbox.
Once you've placed them all, press GO! to watch the characters interact based on their relative positions.
There are a total of 9 endings and 18 unique interactions to discover!

Credits

Game developed in Unity
Art done in Krita
Sounds created using Audacity and Garageband
Music created through AIVA
Laughing sound effects from mixkit

Made ~2 weeks for Josh Grams during the Summer Secret Santa Jam
